channel.title: Zombie Apocalypse (Full Zombie Hive)
channel.description:
Hey, This is Mursanari's Zombie Apocalypse (Clawz Fury, was given source aswell) Updating soon!! but i'm pretty tired atm :\ [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/2127/titlek.png[/img] Zombie Apocalypse Everything you remember about delta, Has now been changed. Zombies. Guns. The Apocalypse! Ak47 and variants... lr300 and variants.. dragunov and variants...mp5 and variants.. colt 45 and variants.. uzi and variants... desert eagle.... tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!! Soon to be:grenade, airstrike. [img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Weapons1.jpg[/img] ^Thanks to Tatemo Website at: [size=18pt]Coming Soon with Vb?[/size] First off.... [size=15pt]this is completely based off Tatemo's Zombiescape.[/size] YES I HAVE PERMISSION FROM HIM TO START A DEV TEAM OFF THIS! [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/5623/proofpicturez.png[/img]
POSITIONS! Owner Mursanari (and drub if he wants?)
Administrators open
Moderators 123kdd100 open Open
Modeler(nothing big, very basic weapons w/color, and basic zombies) Reyx7
Coders PLayRooney Mursanari Marcbob (support coding)
(Please note that all people on the team will have an moderator spot, unless you are a beta tester, if you just applied for moderator, then thats all you would do!)
[code]Application format: Name: Age: Spot of interest: Why do you think you deserve this position?(If going for modeler, give me a sample of your work) How long have you been doing this position? Would you be dedicated? [/code]
Some changes that have been made added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.) Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze) Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!) more spawns to come. THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE! Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45 [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6689/zombie1arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95 [img]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/6163/zombie2arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/6795/zombie3arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/3542/zombie4arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:89 Max hit:6 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:165 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8741/zombie5arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:98 Max hit:8 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:11 Hitpoints:185 [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6703/zombie6arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:111 Max hit:10 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:12 Hitpoints:225 [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4499/fghhi.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:138 Max hit:11 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:245 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/4291/fgjfhmujg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie: Lvl:148 Max hit:13 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:275 [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3167/gddfgdfg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:168 Max hit:15 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:16 Hitpoints:315 [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/1449/dfgdhsdjh.png[/img] Notice how this one is bigger than the others?
Now you may be thinking "Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?" as they get stronger, they begin too....... "Mutate"
Name:Mutation Stage 2 Lvl:184 Max hit:18 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:19 Hitpoints:355 [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7874/hfghfjf.png[/img]
Name:Mutation Stage 3Lvl:201 Max hit:22 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:21 Hitpoints:400 [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/5259/sfjsygherujhdszth.png[/img]
Name:Mutation Stage 4 Lvl:414 Max hit:25 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:25 Hitpoints:800 [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/3221/shdfhgf.png[/img]
Name:Alpha Zombie Lvl:???? Max hit:????? Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:100 Hitpoints:5000-25000 vary [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/4081/djhdgjdgf.png[/img] We are now looking for a new photographer anyne want to help ? :P [size=36pt]ZOMBIE HIVE[/size] There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge Room 1 (complete) Room 2 (complete) Room 3 (complete) Room 4 (complete) Room 5 (Complete) Video of the beta: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WiccI3aTHIk [size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size] now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:
0-49 = level 1 50-99 = level 2 100-199 = level 3 200-399 = level 4 400-799 = level 5 800-1599 = level 6 1600-2799 = level 7 2800-5600 = level 8 5600-11199 = level 9 11200-22399 = level 10 22400-44799 = level 11 44800-89599 = level 12 89600-179199 = level 13 179200-358399 = level 14 358400-716799 = level 15 716800-1433599 = level 16 1433600-2867199 = level 17 2867200-5734399 = level 18 5734400-11468799 = level 19 11468800+ = level 20
Class HQs
There are 3 classes: Army Special Operations Rebels
each has its own hq Spec ops hq: 45% Army HQ: 0% Rebel HQ: 0%
More pics are coming soon! sit tight!

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse (Full Zombie Hive)
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

i code rsps:

Your server isn’t going anywhere for the simple fact of customs.

lol, just gtfo of here, its a server based on zombies not a server based on sword, you stupid drongo.
Pretty much what eye said.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse (Full Zombie Hive)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

i code rsps:

Your server isn’t going anywhere for the simple fact of customs.

/facepalm
You’re kidding me, right?
He’s not making a server out of customs… He’s basically bringing his “Runescape Private Server” (quoted because it barely is that anmore) into a different era in time (also partially fictional).
It’s a zombie survival server, or however you would like to phrase it.
If you can re-read the entire OP, re-read your own post and not feel like an idiot, I will be amazed.

Read full topic
